Your task is to measure the melting point of gallium, which is located around the kitchen. The objects you can use are thermometer, fridge, metal pot, stove. You should pick up a thermometer in the kitchen. After you melt the gallium, you should use thermometer to measure the temperature of it. If the melting point of gallium is above 150.0 degrees celsius, focus on the blue box. If the melting point of gallium is below 150.0 degrees celsius, focus on the orange box. The boxes are located around the kitchen.
